item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Sebastian Risco! I’m a software engineer with a strong interest in Serverless Computing, Cloud Computing and DevOps culture. I love developing in Go and Python, languages I use in most of the projects I work on, which you can find in my GitHub. I’m also a big fan of Open Source and Free Software, specially of the GNU/Linux operating system (I use arch, BTWüòÜ).
